name: Stickman Blow (Balloon Hero)
description:
Blow is better than No job but it's not an easy job!
----------------------------------------------------------------
Try to play Blow Hero and jump up as many balloons as possible.
Instructions:
Press and hold your finger down for a few seconds on the screen to blow the balloon. When the balloon is big enough,release your finger.
Notes:
The balloon must be fit into two columns, if the balloon is too big it will explode and Blow Hero will fall down.
Try to blow the balloons fitted with two white points to collect the flowers.
These flowers will be used to buy the colorful balloons.
You can choose the balloons that Blow Hero can bring in.

Hope you have fun!
----------------------------------------
